input_text:
Job Title: Chemical Sales Rep

Location: Minneapolis, MN

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Business Development, Sales

Description:
Mid-sized growing company looking for an experienced Technical Sales Rep out of the paint and coatings industry to be responsible for growing and maintaining sales with new and existing accounts. Excellent opportunity to be part of a growing company that just opened up their second manufacturing facility! Great opportunities for growth!

The Chemical Sales Rep will be directly responsible for growing and maintaining sales with new and existing accounts. This role requires an experienced salesperson with a successful track record or knowledge of selling into the chemical or coatings market. This is an excellent opportunity for someone who wishes to grow within a stable, dynamic, and entrepreneurial company.

Direct responsibility for the sale of coatings into existing company accounts. Provide sales and technical service to existing customersDevelop territory management plans and implement a new customer call strategy sufficient to generate new accountsProvide responsive and knowledgeable support to customers – both commercial, application and technical supportManage customer projects and trials to ensure industry leading service and supportActively participate in industry and market activities to generate future growth opportunities and stay informed of market opportunities. Develop good understanding of customer baseWork with our dedicated chemists and technical support representatives on new products and lab projects to meet product development and growth strategiesManage sales documentation to ensure knowledge is captured and shared with company and customersInterface with customer service, factory operations, and the technical lab on customer activitiesIf you’d like to hear more about this opportunity and others we are currently working on, please contact Devin Heffernan at dheffernan@cps4jobs.com.

JO: 115.24DH

Technical Qualifications:

5+ of years of industrial sales experience within the Coatings marketplaceKnowledge of coatings or chemicals or equipment used in Coatings marketsProven ability for technical selling and ability to prospect, commercialize and maintain accountsIf you’d like to hear more about this opportunity and others we are currently working on, please contact Devin Heffernan at dheffernan@cps4jobs.com.

JO: 115.24DH

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
